snippet.title: Lord Mayor Trailer
snippet.description:
Lord Mayor is a real-time strategy game where you build cities to create an empire that meets the demands of His Majesty the King. The game features maps made up of hexagonal tiles of varying terrains and buildings that contribute various qualities to the city. The goal is to build your city to meet all of the necessary victory conditions before time runs out.

Blog:  https://lordmayorgame.tumblr.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LordMayorGame

-- Theme Song -- 
“Sheep May Safely Graze - BWV 208” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
